column1:
4.5.8	
Diagnostic evaluation of nerves to the pelvis

Rule out confusable diseases, such as neoplastic disease, infection, trauma and spinal 
pathology.

If a peripheral nerve pain syndrome is suspected, refer early to an expert in the field, 
working within a multidisciplinary team environment.

Imaging and neurophysiology help diagnosis but image and nerve locator guided local 
anaesthetic injection is preferable.
